extendedInfo.description: *LOVE LIFE 2 HAS BEEN RELEASED!!! PLEASE CHECK IT OUT!*Live a life you'll loveâ¦go to the hottest parties, meet new friends, and date celebrities. Build up your wardrobe by shopping at the most fashionable stores, then show off your glamorous new clothes at the club. Pursue your own dreams with a career as a model, actor or singer! Become a top guy or top girl in your hot career! Party with REAL players. You'll live a fabulous life in Love Life! Download this fashion game for guys and girls NOW for FREE! - Customize your look with the hottest fashion. Go shopping at 5 different stores and choose from 500+ dresses, shirts, purses, shoes, and accessories!- Visit the salon and get a makeover! Choose from over 20 different hair styles! Dye your hair with 8 possible colors!- Feeling tired? Visit the Cafe for an energy boost from coffee or an iced latte!- Select one of THREE possible glamorous careers! Become a model, actor/actress, or singer! Earn your place on the red carpet and become a superstar idol! You might be chased by paparazzi!- Hang out at the coolest nightclubs. Make friends with REAL players and flirt with guys & girls! Become a VIP!- Find a BOYFRIEND or GIRLFRIEND and go out on dates! Kiss, sing, and talk to your boyfriend/girlfriend to upgrade your relationship!- Play WITH FRIENDS: add your Facebook friends to play! Invite friends via email or SMS! Hang out with friends at the movies or the mall!- Android tablets supported! Follow us on TWITTER: @dreamheartgames

reviews.title: BRILLIANT
reviews.comment: amazing so good no slow movents easy to download fantastic graphics and amzing to play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love life
reviews.comment: I love this so much sweet lol lol lol lol lol lol lol.sweet game
reviews.author: Victoria Vaughan

reviews.title: Prices please!!!
reviews.comment: Would b 5 stars, love the game, just don\'t like that I can\'t see prices...please add this little feature. Other than that its okay
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There is no one in the bars.
reviews.comment: I like this game. But there is never anyone in the bar when I go. I had this game a while back and part if what made it fun was being able to mingle but there is no one to mingle with now. Can this be fixed/
reviews.author: Corey Mcmillen

reviews.title: I Love the concept
reviews.comment: But this game could really be a 5 star game if it had chat rooms connected to the clubs.. Then it wouldnt just be a tap n play game.. You could actually mingle with people!!
reviews.author: April Richardson

reviews.title: Good game/Great customer service
reviews.comment: Had an issue resolved ASAP...finally a game that provides help when you need it without a hassle.Good game but I wish it would show full avatars at the clubs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I can\'t see something
reviews.comment: I can\'t see of what my character looks like! >:( But it\'s good! So two stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its cool
reviews.comment: I love this game one of the best games
reviews.author: Ria Lee

reviews.title: I,didn\'t even get a chance to play...
reviews.comment: \"Package File Invalid\" that\'s what this app tells me every time I try downloading and installing the app. Wth?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused much??
reviews.comment: I am a bit confused. I don\'t know who to date guys, there is NOBODY at the party\'s I go to and I wish you could do more. Like be able to walk around and stuff. Since its just a tap game its really hard to get \"addicted\"
reviews.author: Tyler Gannon

reviews.title: Loving it
reviews.comment: I\'m loving it!!! So fun to play and I have lots of new friends I also have a cute boy friend!!! Lol
reviews.author: Fayanna Williams

reviews.title: I mostly dont like this game
reviews.comment: When you want to break up with someone tueres no way to do that and I can\'t see the prices on the clothes and the boys are fat not muscular
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Soo confused****
reviews.comment: Everyone is havin the same problem. No one is in the parties and I\'m at a total lost at how to fix this -.- Plus I want friends cx Please help ;-;
reviews.author: Sammy Fussner

reviews.title: Really Good 3 \302\275
reviews.comment: This game I fun && addictive it should tame less energy to do the job & get more money for it. Also when I buy something with the cash it doesn\'t go to my closet.other than that its perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samgsung galaxy tab two
reviews.comment: It stops working and doesn\'t show everything, fix
reviews.author: kaviar wildgoose

reviews.title: Bad game
reviews.comment: This game freezes my daughters tablet. Either fix or uninstall. And you can\'t date anybody.
reviews.author: Tito santavila Santiago

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This game is so great ivlove this game please ams the Guy who said d prices ore free dodo
reviews.author: Tasha Harwell

reviews.comment: love life is a awesome game to play when your bored.  I recommend it;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing Cash - Global Droid
reviews.comment: The premise is fun.  Like the task-oriented approach (very Sims-like). Have played both LoveLife and LoveLife 2 and in both have completed career levels, earned cash, and gone back in the next day to find lots of my cash gone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish i could give it one star
reviews.comment: Most terrible app i ever had freezes up all the TIME u need to fix this problem because it froze up my phone for a week fix this please
reviews.author: Shelby Malone
